title: Expository Sermon Outline Creator
content: Create a detailed expository sermon outline for [BIBLICAL PASSAGE]. Include: 1) Historical and cultural context, 2) Key theological themes, 3) Three main points with supporting verses, 4) Modern application for each point, 5) Illustration ideas, 6) Discussion questions for small groups. Make it accessible for a diverse congregation.
excerpt: Generate comprehensive expository sermon outlines with theological depth and practical application.

title: Pastoral Care Email Response
content: Help me draft a compassionate pastoral care email to [SITUATION: grieving family member / hospital visit follow-up / struggling with faith / etc.]. The tone should be warm, theologically sound, and include: 1) Acknowledgment of their situation, 2) Relevant scripture for comfort, 3) Practical next steps or resources, 4) Prayer, 5) Clear invitation for further conversation. Keep it concise but heartfelt.
excerpt: Draft compassionate pastoral care emails with scripture and practical support.

title: Church Newsletter Generator
content:
Create a weekly church newsletter for [CHURCH NAME] with the following sections: 1) Opening greeting from pastor, 2) Upcoming events this week (provided below), 3) Ministry highlights, 4) Prayer requests, 5) Volunteer opportunities, 6) Closing encouragement with scripture. Tone should be warm, inclusive, and engaging. Keep each section concise.

Upcoming events:
[LIST EVENTS HERE]
excerpt: Generate engaging weekly newsletters with all essential church communications.

title: Social Media Easter Campaign
content: Design a 7-day social media campaign for Easter week. For each day, provide: 1) Instagram post caption (engaging, max 150 words), 2) Relevant scripture verse, 3) Image description/suggestion, 4) 5 relevant hashtags, 5) Best posting time. Progress from Palm Sunday through Resurrection Sunday, building anticipation and celebrating the Gospel story.
excerpt: Create week-long Easter social media campaigns with daily posts and graphics suggestions.

title: Youth Retreat Planning Assistant
content: Help me plan a [2/3-DAY] youth retreat for [NUMBER] students aged [AGE RANGE] with the theme of [THEME]. Provide: 1) Detailed schedule with session topics, 2) Icebreaker and team-building activities, 3) Discussion questions for small groups, 4) Worship set suggestions, 5) Materials and supplies checklist, 6) Budget breakdown estimate, 7) Risk management considerations.
excerpt: Plan comprehensive youth retreats with schedules, activities, and logistics.

title: Children's Bible Lesson Plan
content: Create an engaging 30-minute Bible lesson for children aged [AGE] based on [BIBLE STORY]. Include: 1) Learning objectives, 2) Opening activity to capture attention, 3) Story presentation with participation elements, 4) Memory verse with motions, 5) Craft or activity that reinforces the lesson, 6) Closing prayer and application, 7) Parent take-home sheet. Make it interactive and age-appropriate.
excerpt: Design interactive Bible lessons for children with activities and take-home materials.

title: Topical Sermon Series Planner
content: Design a [4/6/8-week] sermon series on the topic of [TOPIC: faith in adversity / spiritual disciplines / Christian community / etc.]. For each week provide: 1) Sermon title, 2) Key scripture passages, 3) Main theological point, 4) Practical application, 5) Recommended worship songs that align with the theme, 6) Small group discussion guide. Ensure progression and cohesion throughout the series.
excerpt: Plan multi-week sermon series with cohesive themes and supporting materials.

title: Wedding Ceremony Script
content: Create a personalized Christian wedding ceremony script for [COUPLE NAMES]. Include: 1) Processional order, 2) Opening welcome and prayer, 3) Scripture readings (2-3 suggestions), 4) Marriage homily (5-7 minutes) on covenant and love, 5) Vows (traditional and space for personal vows), 6) Ring exchange, 7) Unity ceremony option, 8) Pronouncement and blessing, 9) Recessional. Balance tradition with personalization.
excerpt: Generate complete Christian wedding ceremony scripts with personalization options.

title: Volunteer Recruitment Email
content: Write a compelling email to recruit volunteers for [MINISTRY AREA: children's ministry / hospitality team / worship tech / etc.]. Include: 1) Engaging subject line, 2) Clear description of the need and impact, 3) Specific roles and time commitments, 4) Spiritual significance of serving, 5) Training and support provided, 6) Easy next steps to sign up, 7) Contact information. Make it inspiring but realistic about commitment.
excerpt: Craft persuasive volunteer recruitment emails that inspire service.

title: Instagram Reel Scripture Series
content: Create a 30-day Instagram Reel series featuring daily scripture encouragement. For each day provide: 1) A powerful scripture verse, 2) Brief 2-3 sentence reflection (conversational tone), 3) Visual concept (background, text overlay style), 4) Trending audio suggestion that fits the mood, 5) Call-to-action for engagement. Focus on themes of hope, faith, and God's love.
excerpt: Design month-long Instagram Reel scripture series with daily content ideas.

title: Church Facility Use Policy
content: Draft a comprehensive church facility use policy for [CHURCH NAME]. Include sections on: 1) Purpose and priorities for facility use, 2) Member vs. non-member access and fees, 3) Prohibited uses and activities, 4) Reservation process and lead times, 5) Setup/cleanup expectations, 6) Damage and security deposits, 7) Insurance requirements, 8) Cancellation policy, 9) Staff supervision requirements. Balance hospitality with stewardship.
excerpt: Create thorough facility use policies that balance hospitality and stewardship.

title: Grief Support Small Group Curriculum
content: Develop a 6-week small group curriculum for those experiencing grief and loss. For each week include: 1) Session theme and objectives, 2) Opening icebreaker or check-in questions, 3) Scripture passages for comfort and hope, 4) Discussion questions (avoid spiritual platitudes), 5) Practical coping strategies, 6) Prayer exercise or meditation, 7) Weekly challenge or reflection, 8) Recommended resources. Approach with sensitivity and authenticity.
excerpt: Build sensitive grief support curriculum with biblical comfort and practical help.

title: Christmas Eve Service Planning
content: Plan a Christmas Eve candlelight service for [TIME: family-friendly 5pm / traditional 11pm / etc.]. Provide: 1) Service flow and timing (60-75 minutes), 2) Scripture readings from the Nativity story, 3) Carol selections with arrangement notes, 4) Sermon outline on the incarnation (12-15 minutes), 5) Candlelighting liturgy, 6) Special elements (children's moment, communion, etc.), 7) Technical needs checklist, 8) Volunteer roles needed.
excerpt: Design complete Christmas Eve services with flow, music, and logistics.

title: Adult Bible Study Discussion Guide
content: Create a discussion guide for an adult Bible study on [BOOK OF THE BIBLE / TOPIC]. Format for [TIMEFRAME: 8 weeks / 12 weeks]. For each session include: 1) Reading assignment, 2) Historical and cultural context, 3) 8-10 open-ended discussion questions, 4) Cross-reference passages, 5) Modern application scenarios, 6) Personal reflection prompts, 7) Prayer focus. Questions should promote depth and transparency.
excerpt: Generate comprehensive Bible study guides with thought-provoking discussion questions.

title: Funeral Sermon Outline
content: Help me prepare a funeral sermon for [DECEASED NAME], who was [BRIEF DESCRIPTION: age, role in church, family situation]. Create an outline that includes: 1) Opening words of comfort, 2) Scripture selections for hope and resurrection, 3) Personal tribute framework (3-5 minutes), 4) Gospel message of eternal life (7-10 minutes), 5) Celebration of their life and faith, 6) Words for those who are grieving, 7) Closing prayer and committal. Balance grief with hope.
excerpt: Prepare compassionate funeral sermons that honor the deceased and offer hope.

title: Advent Devotional Series
content: Write a 4-week Advent devotional series with daily readings. For each of the 4 weeks (Hope, Peace, Joy, Love), create 7 daily devotions that include: 1) Scripture passage, 2) 200-300 word reflection connecting the passage to the weekly theme and the coming of Christ, 3) Reflection question, 4) Short prayer. Progress toward Christmas Day with increasing anticipation. Suitable for individuals or families.
excerpt: Craft complete Advent devotionals with daily readings building to Christmas.

title: Church Budget Presentation
content: Create talking points for presenting the annual church budget to the congregation. Include: 1) Opening statement on stewardship and vision, 2) Overview of income sources and trends, 3) Breakdown of major expense categories with percentages, 4) Comparison to previous year, 5) Special projects or capital needs, 6) Faith goals and ministry expansion plans, 7) How members can give/pledge, 8) Q&A preparation for common concerns. Make financial data accessible and inspiring.
excerpt: Develop clear budget presentations that inspire stewardship and trust.

title: Facebook Event Description Template
content: Write an engaging Facebook event description for [EVENT: VBS / mission trip / church picnic / concert / etc.]. Include: 1) Attention-grabbing opening line, 2) Who should attend and why, 3) Date, time, location clearly stated, 4) What to expect (schedule highlights), 5) Registration/RSVP information, 6) Cost and what's included, 7) Contact person for questions, 8) Emojis and formatting for readability. Make it shareable and exciting.
excerpt: Create compelling Facebook event descriptions that drive registration.

title: Baptism Class Curriculum
content: Develop a [2/3-session] baptism preparation class curriculum for [new believers / parents seeking infant baptism]. Each session should cover: 1) Biblical foundations of baptism, 2) Meaning and symbolism, 3) Your church's specific theology and practice, 4) Expectations and commitments, 5) Testimony preparation (if applicable), 6) Logistics and ceremony details, 7) Discussion questions, 8) Take-home materials. Include parent and sponsor responsibilities if relevant.
excerpt: Create thorough baptism preparation materials explaining theology and practice.

title: Mission Trip Fundraising Letter
content: Write a personal fundraising letter for a mission trip to [LOCATION] with [ORGANIZATION] from [DATES]. Include: 1) Personal greeting and connection, 2) Your calling to this specific mission, 3) Details about the work and community being served, 4) Total cost breakdown and fundraising goal, 5) How their support makes a difference, 6) Specific donation amounts and how to give, 7) Ways to support beyond finances (prayer), 8) Thank you and follow-up promise. Authentic and humble tone.
excerpt: Craft personal mission trip support letters that inspire partnership.

title: Youth Group Icebreaker Games
content: Provide 10 engaging icebreaker games for a youth group of [NUMBER] students aged [AGE RANGE]. For each game include: 1) Game name and one-line description, 2) Objective/purpose, 3) Setup and materials needed, 4) Step-by-step instructions, 5) Time required, 6) Variations for different group sizes, 7) Debrief questions to connect to faith/community. Mix high-energy and reflective activities.
excerpt: Get creative icebreaker games that build community and engagement.

title: Prayer Meeting Guide
content: Create a structure for a [60/90-minute] prayer meeting focused on [THEME: healing / community needs / missions / revival / etc.]. Include: 1) Opening worship/meditation (10 min), 2) Scripture reading on prayer, 3) Prayer stations or formats (adoration, confession, thanksgiving, supplication), 4) Specific prayer focuses with biblical grounding, 5) Small group prayer time, 6) Corporate prayer or closing liturgy, 7) Practical tips for leading prayer time. Balance structure with Spirit-led flexibility.
excerpt: Design meaningful prayer meetings with focus and variety.

title: Church Website Homepage Copy
content: Write compelling homepage copy for [CHURCH NAME] website. Include: 1) Hero section headline (10 words max) that captures your mission, 2) Subheading (20 words) expanding the invitation, 3) 'About' section (100 words) sharing your story and values, 4) 'First Time Visitor' section addressing common questions, 5) Service times and location prominently, 6) Three featured ministries with brief descriptions, 7) Clear calls-to-action for next steps. Welcoming tone for seekers and believers.
excerpt: Create welcoming website copy that invites visitors and shares your mission.

title: TikTok Ministry Content Ideas
content: Generate 15 TikTok content ideas for church ministry that are authentic and engaging. For each idea provide: 1) Content concept/hook, 2) Target audience, 3) Key message or takeaway, 4) Suggested video format (POV, day in life, Q&A, etc.), 5) Trending sound or music style, 6) Hashtag strategy, 7) Engagement prompt. Focus on relatable faith content that resonates with Gen Z without being cringe.
excerpt: Get authentic TikTok ideas that share faith with younger audiences.

title: Community Outreach Event Plan
content: Design a community outreach event for [EVENT: back-to-school fair / free car wash / block party / food distribution / etc.]. Provide: 1) Event vision and goals, 2) Target audience and how to reach them, 3) Schedule and activities breakdown, 4) Volunteer roles and numbers needed, 5) Budget with major expense categories, 6) Partnerships with local organizations, 7) Marketing strategy, 8) Follow-up plan for connecting attendees to church, 9) Success metrics.
excerpt: Plan impactful community outreach events that serve and connect.

title: Teen Discipleship Curriculum
content: Create a 12-week teen discipleship curriculum on [TOPIC: identity in Christ / spiritual disciplines / relationships / serving / etc.]. For each week include: 1) Session title and learning goals, 2) Relevant scripture passages, 3) Teaching outline with discussion prompts, 4) Interactive activities or case studies, 5) Small group questions, 6) Weekly challenge/application, 7) Parent connection (optional email/text), 8) Leader notes. Make it conversational and allow for vulnerability.
excerpt: Build deep discipleship materials for teenagers with practical application.

title: Sermon Illustration Finder
content: I'm preaching on [TOPIC/THEME] from [SCRIPTURE PASSAGE]. Help me find 3-5 powerful sermon illustrations that connect this biblical truth to modern life. For each illustration provide: 1) Brief story or example (100-150 words), 2) Connection to the scripture/theme, 3) Application question for reflection, 4) Source/attribution if needed. Include a mix of personal stories, current events, historical examples, or cultural references. Make them memorable and relevant.
excerpt: Find compelling sermon illustrations that connect biblical truth to modern life.

title: Membership Class Outline
content: Develop a [4/6-week] membership class for new members joining [CHURCH NAME]. Each session should cover: 1) Session topic and objectives, 2) Teaching content outline, 3) Your church's history and values, 4) Denominational distinctives (if applicable), 5) Membership expectations and covenant, 6) Ministry involvement opportunities, 7) Discussion questions, 8) Action steps. Final session should include membership commitment and next steps.
excerpt: Create comprehensive membership classes that integrate new members well.

title: Staff Meeting Agenda Template
content: Create a productive weekly staff meeting agenda template for church staff. Include: 1) Opening prayer/devotional (10 min), 2) Wins and celebrations, 3) Calendar review and event planning, 4) Ministry updates from each department, 5) Problem-solving or decision items, 6) Pastoral care concerns (confidential), 7) Vision casting and strategic discussion, 8) Action items and assignments, 9) Closing prayer. Time allocations for [60/90-minute] meeting. Balance task and team care.
excerpt: Build efficient staff meeting agendas that accomplish work and build team.

title: Giving Campaign Communication Plan
content: Design a multi-week stewardship/giving campaign for [PURPOSE: annual budget / building project / debt reduction / missions]. Create a communication plan with: 1) Campaign theme and key messages, 2) Timeline (4-6 weeks), 3) Weekend sermon series titles and focus, 4) Weekly email or letter content, 5) Social media posts and graphics ideas, 6) Testimonial collection strategy, 7) Pledge card and commitment process, 8) Celebration and follow-up plan. Biblical focus on generosity, not guilt.
excerpt: Plan comprehensive giving campaigns with biblical teaching and clear communication.

title: Crisis Counseling Response Guide
content: I need guidance for pastorally responding to [CRISIS: suicide attempt / abuse disclosure / addiction / mental health crisis / etc.]. Provide: 1) Immediate response steps (what to say and do), 2) Theological framework for understanding, 3) Relevant scripture for comfort (use with discernment), 4) Boundaries and when to refer to professionals, 5) Professional resources in the community, 6) Follow-up care plan, 7) Self-care for the counselor. Emphasize safety and professional help.
excerpt: Get wise pastoral guidance for crisis situations requiring professional care.

title: Worship Leader Devotional
content: Write a [weekly/monthly] devotional for worship team members on the heart of worship. Each entry should include: 1) Scripture passage on worship, 2) 300-400 word reflection on leading worship as ministry not performance, 3) Practical application for rehearsal or Sunday morning, 4) Prayer focus for the team, 5) Encouraging quote from a worship leader or theologian. Themes could include: excellence, humility, preparation, unity, Spirit-dependence, etc.
excerpt: Create devotionals that shape the hearts of worship leaders and teams.

title: VBS Theme Development
content: Develop a complete Vacation Bible School theme concept for [THEME IDEA]. Provide: 1) Theme name and tagline, 2) Key Bible verse and daily lesson topics, 3) Age group rotation stations (Bible story, games, crafts, music, snacks), 4) Decoration and set design ideas, 5) Costume suggestions for leaders, 6) Music and movement ideas, 7) Promotional materials concepts, 8) Supply list categories, 9) Volunteer job descriptions. Creative and engaging for elementary age.
excerpt: Design complete VBS themes with lessons, activities, and decorations.

title: Church App Push Notification Schedule
content: Create a monthly push notification schedule for our church mobile app. For each week provide: 1) Sunday morning service reminder (time and theme), 2) Mid-week encouragement with scripture, 3) Event or ministry highlight, 4) Prayer prompt or challenge, 5) Weekend event preview. Each notification should be: concise (under 100 characters), engaging, action-oriented, varied in content type. Include best send times for maximum engagement.
excerpt: Schedule strategic app notifications that engage without overwhelming.

title: Missionary Support Letter Response
content: Help me write a thoughtful response to a missionary's prayer letter about [SITUATION/UPDATE]. Include: 1) Personal greeting and affirmation, 2) Specific responses to their shared needs or praises, 3) Encouragement from scripture, 4) Commitment to pray (be specific about what you'll pray for), 5) Update on your life/church they'd appreciate, 6) Tangible support offer if applicable, 7) Warm closing. Show you actually read their letter and care about their work.
excerpt: Write meaningful responses to missionary letters that encourage and support.

title: Small Group Leader Training
content: Create a training session outline for new small group leaders (2-3 hours). Include: 1) Vision and purpose of small groups in discipleship, 2) Leader's role and spiritual qualifications, 3) Facilitating discussion (not teaching), 4) Creating safe community and handling conflict, 5) Pastoral care basics and when to escalate, 6) Practical logistics (hosting, childcare, schedules), 7) Resources and support available, 8) Q&A time, 9) Commitment and covenant. Include handouts or resources to provide.
excerpt: Train small group leaders in facilitation, care, and community building.

title: Sermon Podcast Show Notes
content: Write engaging show notes for our sermon podcast episode titled '[SERMON TITLE]' from [SCRIPTURE PASSAGE]. Include: 1) Compelling episode description (150 words) that hooks listeners, 2) Key takeaways or timestamps for main points, 3) Discussion questions for listeners, 4) Related scripture references, 5) Links to mentioned resources, 6) Call-to-action (subscribe, share, visit website), 7) SEO-friendly keywords. Make it searchable and shareable.
excerpt: Create podcast show notes that make sermons discoverable and actionable.

title: Conflict Resolution Meeting Guide
content: I need to facilitate a conflict resolution meeting between [PARTIES: staff members / ministry leaders / church members]. Provide: 1) Pre-meeting preparation (individual conversations, ground rules), 2) Opening prayer and tone-setting, 3) Structured conversation format (each person shares perspective), 4) Active listening techniques, 5) Biblical principles for reconciliation, 6) Problem-solving framework, 7) Agreement documentation, 8) Follow-up plan. Emphasize humility, truth-telling in love, and restoration.
excerpt: Navigate church conflicts with biblical wisdom and practical mediation steps.

title: Annual Report Executive Summary
content: Write an inspiring executive summary for our church annual report. Include: 1) Opening statement on God's faithfulness this year, 2) Key ministry accomplishments and stories (3-4 highlights), 3) Statistical snapshot (attendance, salvations, baptisms, groups), 4) Financial health overview (simplified), 5) Challenges faced and overcome, 6) Vision for the coming year, 7) Call to partnership and involvement, 8) Closing gratitude and prayer. 500-750 words. Balance celebration and future vision.
excerpt: Craft annual report summaries that celebrate faithfulness and cast vision.

title: Lent Sermon Series Framework
content: Design a sermon series for the [NUMBER] weeks of Lent leading to Easter. Provide: 1) Series title and overarching theme, 2) Each week's sermon title and focus, 3) Scripture passages for each week, 4) Progression toward Good Friday and Resurrection Sunday, 5) Suggested spiritual disciplines to practice weekly, 6) Corporate worship elements (prayers, songs, liturgy), 7) Small group discussion guide, 8) Visual/artistic elements for Sundays. Reflective and preparatory tone.
excerpt: Plan Lenten sermon series that prepare hearts for Easter through reflection.

title: Parent Dedication Ceremony
content: Create a child dedication ceremony for [NUMBER] families. Include: 1) Opening welcome and explanation of dedication vs. baptism, 2) Scripture readings on parenting and faith legacy, 3) Questions for parents (commitment to raise child in faith), 4) Role of the church community (congregation response), 5) Prayers for each child and family, 6) Blessing liturgy, 7) Certificate or gift presentation, 8) Photo opportunity suggestions. Family-friendly and meaningful.
excerpt: Design meaningful child dedication ceremonies for families and congregation.

title: Church Safety and Security Policy
content: Draft a comprehensive safety and security policy for [CHURCH NAME]. Address: 1) Sunday morning security team roles, 2) Child protection protocols (check-in, background checks), 3) Emergency procedures (fire, medical, active threat), 4) Facility access and key control, 5) Weather-related closures decision tree, 6) Communication plan during emergencies, 7) Training requirements for volunteers, 8) Legal and insurance considerations. Balance welcoming environment with wise precautions.
excerpt: Create thorough safety policies that protect while maintaining welcome.

title: Mission Statement Workshop Facilitation
content: I need to facilitate a workshop for church leadership to develop/refine our mission statement. Provide: 1) Pre-work to assign participants, 2) Workshop agenda (3-4 hours), 3) Ice breaker and vision casting exercise, 4) Biblical foundation discussion, 5) Mission statement drafting process, 6) Evaluation criteria for good mission statements, 7) Refinement and wordsmithing activities, 8) Next steps for adoption and implementation. Collaborative and inclusive process.
excerpt: Facilitate mission statement development with leadership engagement.

title: Men's Ministry Kickoff Event
content: Plan a men's ministry kickoff event for [NUMBER] men. Provide: 1) Event concept and theme, 2) Schedule for [TIMEFRAME: breakfast / evening / Saturday morning], 3) Opening activity or competition, 4) Short teaching or testimony (topic suggestions), 5) Vision casting for men's ministry, 6) Breakout discussion questions, 7) Sign-ups for ongoing groups or events, 8) Food and logistics, 9) Follow-up strategy. Masculine, authentic, gospel-centered.
excerpt: Launch men's ministry with engaging events that build brotherhood.

title: New Testament Survey Curriculum
content: Create a [12/16-week] New Testament survey course for adults. Each session should cover [1-2 books] and include: 1) Historical context and authorship, 2) Key themes and structure, 3) Important passages and teachings, 4) How this book points to Christ, 5) Application for today, 6) Memory verse, 7) Discussion questions, 8) Further reading suggestions. Progressive overview that builds biblical literacy and love for Scripture.
excerpt: Build comprehensive NT survey that increases biblical knowledge and love.

title: Email Newsletter Template Design
content: Design a reusable email newsletter template for [CHURCH NAME] with sections for: 1) Header with logo and navigation, 2) Pastor's message (150 words), 3) Upcoming events (3-4 with images), 4) Ministry spotlight (rotating), 5) Volunteer needs, 6) Prayer requests, 7) Giving information, 8) Social media links, 9) Unsubscribe option. Mobile-responsive layout. Include color scheme, font suggestions, and content length guidelines for each section.
excerpt: Create professional email newsletter templates with consistent branding.

title: Testimony Preparation Guide
content: Help someone prepare their personal testimony for sharing at [BAPTISM / CHURCH SERVICE / SMALL GROUP]. Provide: 1) Three-part structure (before Christ, conversion, after Christ), 2) Questions to guide their writing, 3) What to include and what to avoid, 4) Time guidelines ([3/5/10 minutes]), 5) Tips for authentic delivery, 6) How to emphasize Christ not just personal story, 7) Practice and feedback suggestions. Coaching tone that empowers the storyteller.
excerpt: Guide believers to share powerful testimonies that glorify God.

title: Church Planting Strategy Document
content: Develop a strategic plan for planting a new church in [LOCATION/COMMUNITY]. Include: 1) Community demographics and spiritual needs assessment, 2) Vision and mission for the church plant, 3) Target launch date and milestones, 4) Core team development plan, 5) Funding and financial sustainability, 6) Gathering strategy (launch team, preview services, public launch), 7) Partnership with sending church or network, 8) Metrics for health and growth, 9) Three-year roadmap. Prayerful and strategic.
excerpt: Create comprehensive church planting strategies from vision to launch.

title: Women's Conference Session Plan
content: Design a teaching session for a women's conference on [TOPIC: identity / purpose / relationships / spiritual growth / etc.]. Include: 1) Session title and key scripture, 2) Opening story or illustration, 3) Teaching outline (30-40 minutes) with main points, 4) Interactive elements or response activities, 5) Personal application challenges, 6) Small group discussion questions, 7) Prayer ministry time, 8) Take-home resources or action steps. Vulnerable, biblical, and empowering tone.
excerpt: Plan impactful women's conference sessions with teaching and ministry.

title: Church Merger Integration Plan
content: Create a [12/18-month] integration plan for merging [CHURCH A] and [CHURCH B]. Address: 1) Governance and leadership transition, 2) Staff integration and role clarity, 3) Theological alignment and distinctives, 4) Facility and resource consolidation, 5) Combined ministry launch timeline, 6) Communication strategy to both congregations, 7) Cultural integration and honoring both histories, 8) Celebration and mourning space, 9) Success metrics and checkpoints. Sensitive to grief and excitement.
excerpt: Navigate church mergers with careful planning and pastoral sensitivity.

title: Biblical Counseling Session Guide
content: I'm providing biblical counseling for someone struggling with [ISSUE: anxiety / depression / marital conflict / parenting / addiction]. Help me prepare by providing: 1) Relevant scripture that addresses the issue, 2) Questions to understand their situation deeply, 3) Theological truths to speak into their struggle, 4) Practical action steps or homework, 5) Prayer focus areas, 6) Resources (books, support groups, professional referrals), 7) Follow-up plan. Gospel-centered and compassionate approach.
excerpt: Prepare for biblical counseling with scripture, questions, and resources.

title: Summer Camp Devotional Series
content: Write a [5/7-day] devotional series for youth summer camp with the theme of [THEME]. Each day should include: 1) Catchy daily title, 2) Scripture passage (readable for teens), 3) 5-7 minute talk outline with stories/illustrations, 4) Group discussion questions, 5) Personal challenge or commitment, 6) Evening campfire reflection prompt, 7) Counselor talking points for follow-up. Build throughout the week toward a response invitation.
excerpt: Create week-long camp devotionals that engage teens and point to Jesus.

title: LinkedIn Ministry Presence Strategy
content: Develop a LinkedIn strategy for church leadership to engage professionals. Include: 1) Profile optimization for pastors/leaders, 2) Content pillars (faith and work, leadership, current events commentary), 3) Post ideas and frequency (15 ideas), 4) How to share sermon insights professionally, 5) Engaging with local business community, 6) Building thought leadership, 7) Connecting LinkedIn presence to church mission. Professional yet authentic Christian voice.
excerpt: Build LinkedIn presence that connects faith with professional life.

title: Elder/Deacon Nomination Process
content: Design a process for nominating and affirming new elders/deacons at [CHURCH NAME]. Include: 1) Biblical qualifications (1 Timothy 3, Titus 1), 2) Nomination timeline and process, 3) Candidate assessment and interview questions, 4) Congregational input and affirmation steps, 5) Training/orientation for new leaders, 6) Public installation service outline, 7) Ongoing accountability structures, 8) Term lengths and rotation. Balance congregational voice with careful discernment.
excerpt: Establish godly processes for identifying and affirming church leaders.

title: Multisite Campus Launch Plan
content: Create a launch plan for opening a new campus/site of [CHURCH NAME] in [LOCATION]. Address: 1) Vision and why this location, 2) Timeline from announcement to launch day, 3) Campus pastor recruitment and preparation, 4) Launch team development (size, roles), 5) Facility selection and setup, 6) Marketing and community engagement, 7) Preview services schedule, 8) Launch day plan and celebration, 9) First 90 days integration with main campus, 10) Sustainability metrics. Strategic and prayerful.
excerpt: Plan new campus launches with strategic preparation and clear vision.
